main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Jersey City on July 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light, hovering over the skyline and approximately 500 feet in diameter., The observer saw the object for about 10 minutes before it accelerated and disappeared., The object emitted a bright glow and was unable to be measured for altitude or distance, as there were no reference points., The case was forwarded to Project Blue Book for investigation after the report., The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, glowing object in the sky
witness description: The observer was a resident who was in his backyard during the sighting.
